verbs.description: U.S. allies France , Germany and Britain [V: have] all made overtures to persuade Trump to stay in the pact .
[ARG0: U.S. allies France , Germany and Britain] have all [V: made] [ARG1: overtures to persuade Trump to stay in the pact] .
[ARG0: U.S. allies France , Germany and Britain] have all made overtures to [V: persuade] [ARG1: Trump] [ARG2: to stay in the pact] .
U.S. allies France , Germany and Britain have all made overtures to persuade [ARG1: Trump] to [V: stay] [ARG3: in the pact] .
